1.Title: Time-Devouring Stratagem
1.Description:
The equipper's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>30%</color>. When <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attacks</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</color> hit enemies suffering an Attribute Anomaly, the equipper's Anomaly Proficiency increases by <color=#2BAD00>75</color> for 15s.
When the equipper's Anomaly Proficiency is greater than or equal to 375, <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> DMG inflicted by the equipper increases by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color>.
